name: stata
title: Stata
description: Comprehensive Stata integration: quick file access, smart templates, and advanced command reference
author: rrmaximiliano

commands.name: open-new-do-file
commands.title: Open New Do File
commands.description: Open Stata and create a new do file

commands.name: recent-stata-do-files
commands.title: Recent Do Files
commands.description: List and open recently used .do files

commands.name: recent-datasets
commands.title: Recent Datasets
commands.description: List and open recently used .dta files

commands.name: create-do-file
commands.title: Create Do File
commands.description: Create a new .do file with templates

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
